#####R named vector
```{r named vector}
library(tidyverse)

pmf <- c("Bowl 1" = 0.5,
         "Bowl 2" = 0.5)

Mult <- function(prior,hypo,likelihood){
  prior[hypo] <- prior[hypo] * likelihood
  prior
}

Normalize <- function(pmf){pmf / sum(pmf)}

pmf <- pmf %>%
          Mult("Bowl 1",0.75) %>%
          Mult("Bowl 2",0.5) %>%
          Normalize()
    
pmf

pmf["Bowl 1"]
pmf["Bowl 2"]

```
